flavor: In the decades since the fall of the Witch-King, hidden Zhengyian relics have been unearthed across Vaasa. For some, contact with these fell artifacts exposed the individual and their descendants with a trace of Zhengyi’s dark power. Blood Mages are most prevalent among the half-orcs of Palischuk; among them, Knight-Vindicator Mansard Kanaoth—the only half-orc on the Ironfell Council.
name: Zhengyian Blood Mage
